TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataBoundControlMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Represents the different data-entry modes for a data-bound control or a particular field in ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode Edit = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Represents the edit mode, which enables users to update the values of an existing record or data field.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode Insert = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Represents the insert mode, which enables users to enter values for a new record or data field.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode ReadOnly = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Represents the display mode, which prevents the user from modifying the values of a record or a data field.
